From: The Bigcommerce Team Subject: Join us for the March Town Hall To: {{lead.Email Address}} Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re excited to invite you to our March Bigcommerce Town Hall. During this monthly conversation, Bigcommerce CEO Brent Bellm and Chief Product Officer Tim Schulz will give you a detailed look at recent platform enhancements and what’s coming up next. Bigcommerce Town Hall <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/779580504753718274]]> When: Tuesday March 29, 2016 from 2–3 PM CT What: A discussion of Bigcommerce news and a look at upcoming product enhancements, followed by live Q&A Presenters: CEO Brent Bellm and CPO Tim Schulz Reserve your spot <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/779580504753718274]]> We’ll hold a live Q&A session during the Town Hall, but you can also submit questions in advance by commenting in our community forum <[[http://forum.bigcommerce.com/f67/register-today-and-submit-your-s-for-the-march-town-hall--30453/]]>.
If you’re unable to join us, don’t worry — we’ll record each Town Hall and post the video in the Community Forum and Partner Portal.
Hope to see you there,
The Bigcommerce Team
